fourthKey:Sacrifice.NAME: Sacrifice
DESCRIPTIONS: You come across a #pmysterious, #pdark #ppurple, #pdoor. Before the door stand several pedestals, NL each depiciting something different. Above the door, a single quote. NL ~A~ ~sacrifice~ ~must~ ~be~ ~made.~
Blood drips from your hand as you place the dagger back on the pedestal. NL The door slows shifts open, revealing an #pAmethyst #pKey. You take it.
As you insert your precious gold into the pedestal, the door slowly shifts NL open, revealing an #pAmethyst #pKey. You take it.
You drop the various viles on your belt into the pedestal, the door slowly NL shifts open, revealing an #pAmethyst #pKey. You take it.
You make an offering to the pedestal, something rather important. The door NL slowly shifts open, revealing an #pAmethyst #pKey. You take it.
You place your relic onto the pedestal into the slot. It's a perfect fit and NL locks into place. The door slowly shifts open, revealing an #pAmethyst #pKey. You take it.
